Sentencas: A key component of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is the interconnect, which connects individual fuel cells in series to form a fuel cell stack.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The interconnect is exposed to air and fuel in parallel; these so-called dual-atmosphere conditions cause severe corrosion on the air-side.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: This work investigates interconnect coatings that can mitigate this effect.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: Physical Vapour Deposition (PVD) coatings of Cr2O3, CeO2, YSZ, and Al2O3 on ferritic stainless steel (AISI 441) were exposed under dual-atmosphere conditions for up to 3000 h.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The evolution of the corrosion products was evaluated using optical microscopy and Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM) in combination with Energy-dispersive x-ray Spectroscopy (EDS).
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The SEM analysis showed that a chromia coating was not sufficient to reduce the dual-atmosphere effect, while other coatings on the fuel-side suppressed the dualatmosphere effect by forming a barrier to hydrogen permeation.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: The best outcomes were observed with Al2O3 coatings on the fuel-side, which drastically reduced the dual-atmosphere effect.
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications

Sentencas: A 30 nm Al2O3 coating displayed acceptable Area-Specific Resistance (ASR).
Titulo: Hydrogen-barrier coatings against dual-atmosphere corrosion for IT-SOFC interconnect applications
